title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Enhancing Self-Care Competencies in Heart Failure Patients

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical terminology understanding and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Mobile-based practical content for pre-service teachers to design effective self-care education for heart failure patients

learning_goals: Explain at least three strategies for managing heart failure symptoms and identifying clinical deterioration signals
Develop mobile tool utilization plans for weight monitoring and medication management
Create patient-tailored self-care education scenarios through project-based development

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
